title: Was Governor Stephen Moore a lawyer for the work of children from the age of 11?
subtitle: The United States President Donald Trump's selection for the position of Governor of the Federal Reserve faced a thorough examination of his earlier writings and announcements in the spring of 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Governor Stephen Moore once said, "I'm gonna get rid of a lot of these child labor laws, I want people to start working on 11, 12."
